sense.def: Pathological Condition of huang dan 黃疸 , yellow dan -illness, accompanied by illness signs of kidney depletion such as anuria and tinnitus, painful lumbar region and back, weakness of legs and knees. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 4: 腎黃，小便不通，氣急心悶，五色 黃，瓜蒂散方 , “For kidney jaundice with an inability to pass urine, qi urgency and heart-pressure, as well as for all [other types of] jaundice, [use] the recipe for a powder with gua di ”.
